{% extends "templates/item_page.html" %} {% set namespaces = "cmoon" %} {% set library_name = "Concepts" %} {% set item_name = "movable_value" %} {% block nested %}../{% endblock %} {% block content2 %} {{macros.defined("cmoon.concepts", github_url_src + "/concepts/concepts.ixx")}} {{macros.overload_set([ " template concept movable_value = std::move_constructible> && std::constructible_from, T>; " ])}}

The concept movable_value<T> is satisfied if and only if T is moveable, but does not need to be swappable.
